website_summaries.verdict: Though there's nothing extraordinary about it, the SX600 HS is a solid choice for snapshooters wanting a simple step up from a smartphone without sacrificing on-the-go sharing.
pros: The Canon PowerShot SX600 HS delivers easy automatic shooting options, very good photo and video quality, and a useful zoom range with optical image stabilization in a slim, lightweight package and at a reasonable price
cons: The lens is slow, so indoor use of the zoom lens is limited, the autofocus can be frustratingly inaccurate at times, and low-light photo and video quality are merely OK

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: We tried a couple of different brands when our last PowerShot broke and finally went back to the SX600. There is a huge difference in the picture quality - especially when there is only a liitle bit of light - compared to other brands. Until now I think it is the best point and shoot of its class. The difference can be seen when you zoom into the pics on the computer. The pics are very sharp and the colors are "relistic" under different conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: came in time just before my trip to Massachusetts absolutely fell in love. The features are also very cool. The pictures are high quality and the zoom is great. I have tons of pictures .. Here's a few
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best point-and-shoot digital camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is absolutely amazing. For just a digital point-and shoot digital camera, I was very impressed. The picture quality is wonderful, and very crisp. The many effects are fun to play with, and the creative shot can offer some pleasant suprises. I was a bit worried about the pop-up flash, but so far it hasn't gotten in my way. Night-time pictures come out beautifully, and the zoom is rather impressive, which is mostly what sold me on this camera. The wifi connection allows my to upload the pictures to my phone, so I can send them around with less hassle. I would highly reccomend this camera to anyone, especially condsidering the fairly low price. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelin

customer_reviews.title: Small in size but packs a big punch
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with the quality of pictures this little Canon PowerShot delivers. It is small, trim and fits nicely in my hand and pocket. Previous to this SX600, I owned an older Canon (husband ran over it with his tractor). The only thing I liked better about the older version is that it took standard AA batteries. This camera has a small square re-chargeable battery which has to be taken out the camera to charge - which is a pain. But overall, I am very pleased with this purchase. This Canon is light-weight, has a nice large LCD screen, is easy to operate and, best of all, takes great, crisp pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Incredibly light weight
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Incredibly light weight. My only gripe is that manual that came with it is extremely basic. Looking through it it seemed as if the camera was missing so many important functions. But then i found an online manual - this explains ALL the functions and there is so much you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: andrew tokash

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera but not the flash
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, but I chose to give it 4 stars because I am not happy with the flash. You have to turn it on and it pops up to have the flash turn off you have to manuley push it down. Somehow when I read several reviews I must of missed the part about the flash. The reason I bought this camera was to take spontaneous pictures of my preschooler's. I tried to leave the flash up but it would get caught on items as I had it hanging around my neck. Other than that, it takes great pictures, very clear and for the price it is worth every dollar I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: CANON POWERSHOTS, EXCELLENT LINE
customer_reviews.text: So compact that I had to trade wife for her old, slightly larger, Powershot. My hands have nerve damage and needed slightly larger camera. I shopped the Powershot line because we have had great luck with hers. This has great lenses and wonderful zoom for it's size. Powershots are wonderful cameras. Compact, durable, and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe Dan

customer_reviews.title: Canon SX600 HS
customer_reviews.text: I researched quite a bit for a camera. This is my first Canon and I really like it. I really like the option of Wi-Fi. I have it connected to my cell phone and it will work anywhere, just transfer to phone and email, post, etc. I like the creative shots which takes 5 photos at a time. There is an original and 4 other shots of the same photo in sepia, B & W,, single shots of people in photo.. The camera has very little lag time between shots. The charge last quite a while as well. It take clear crisp photos.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I admit it, I am not an intellectual giant where cameras, computers, smart phones, etc., are concerned. This is the second point-and-shoot I've had and I like it a lot. And red is cool! When you're 66 years old, it's important to be cool in whatever small ways you can be. There still is stuff I don't know how to use yet on the camera, but if it's important at some point, I'll get online and read how to it. (I miss the paper manuals!)
customer_reviews.author: pattyb

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research before I bought a camera. I settled on this one. 18x optical zoom, 16 megapixel, 1080 video. This camera is so easy to use it's almost idiot proof. It has all manual settings if you want to mess with that stuff. Lots of features and options I will never use but just in case I want to I have the option! I really, really like this camera and I've barely begun. I bought it for a trip overseas. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Camera
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying another camera after having problem after problem with Nikons. Almost went on my trip with just my phone which does a great job but wanted something with a bit more zoom capability. I not only tried this camera but ended up ordering a "used, like new" one so that I would have it in time. I'm glad to report that it worked perfectly during my whole trip and has features that I enjoyed learning how to use. Great little camera. Light weight and easy to operate with one hand. Terrific battery life and was able to find inexpensive extra batteries with Amazon as well. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: "Good things come in small packages"
customer_reviews.text: Met all expectations, battery life very good, controls easy to navigate, lightweight, "auto" gets it right almost every shot. Flash very well behaved ( requests u to raise flash), good low light pictures, wi-fi transfer works very well, video sharp, sound very good, panning, zooming in & out will take some practice. Very satisfied overall!
customer_reviews.author: Mystic Wharf Rat

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an identical Canon camera I had that the cats knocked off a table and broke. Delivery was very fast and the camera appears to be in excellent shape and just as described. I have only taken a half dozen photos with it so far but the ones I took were fine.
customer_reviews.author: grannypants

customer_reviews.title: Still Shooting Great Pix After 5 Years
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little point 'n' shoot camera, portable & sturdy & takes very good quality images. For the purchase price, this is near the top of my "best buys" in consumer electronics over the last 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The video on this camera is awesome and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The video on this camera is awesome and so easy to use. The problem I have with this camera and several others I have tried is that pictures are not clear when you are in motion.. I trail ride horses and need a camera that will take a reasonable picture at the walk speed. Most of the ones I took with this one were blurred I may need a lower MP camera but even those are hard to come by. Overall if you don't need a camera that is steady while you are moving this one is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: avid shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for the money...
customer_reviews.text: This is the camera that I have in my camera case. The main reason I bought this camera is to take night picture's of the Northern Lights. It's a great little camera and has feature's I haven't yet explored. I even made a bear movie from this summer (2016) and it turned out beautiful. I'd recommend this camera for any beginner as well as one for an experienced camera buff.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Tew

customer_reviews.title: Loving this camera at home, soon to be tested on the road.  More complex than expected for a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Initial set up problems re my wi fi system were promptly addressed by Tech Support. Not as intuitive or even close to my previous Canons, I am relying on my partial downloaded manual. I do wish a complete manual came with the camera, but understand why that is impractical.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Backlund

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the inexperienced photographer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! I love this camera and the photo's it takes. I took it on vacation to Hawaii and it provided incredible results for a novice photographer like myself. The pictures turned out great. I also take pictures of jewelry my wife makes as a craft and they turn out pretty good as well. The ability to transfer pictures via wifi is a great advantage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby K.

customer_reviews.title: Great little point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Great little point and shoot; takes excellent pictures. Have to complain about Canon, however: The camera is equipped to wirelessly transfer photos, and is advertised as such. If you have a MAC with the latest IOS, then Canon's web site announces that there is no compatibility between the two. Canon's technical assistance recommends that the user transfer by mini USB cord (Not provided by Canon with the camera) or use a card reader. Otherwise a five star.
customer_reviews.author: don W

customer_reviews.title: The camera itself is fine, but neither the instructions accompanying the camera nor ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is fine, but neither the instructions accompanying the camera nor the detailed user's handbook I downloaded from Canon gave comprehensible instructions for using the wifi feature for wireless downloading photos to my computer. I finally gave up and purchased the connector cord (it wasn't included with the camera). I also do not like having to manually open the pop-up flash when natural light is not sufficient for a proper picture. My prior camera set the flash automatically when it was needed. Picture quality, however, is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for a decent price. We bought one just for our last vacation. It slid off my lap into a cold Rocky Mountain stream. Fished it out, drained the water out, and let it dry overnight. The next day everything worked but the flash! Its still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: NAK

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. I like some of the gimmicky features (fish eye, toy camera etc.). Camera is compact and light, takes really good photo's for under 200.00. I love the battery pack vs rechargeable AA's - I don't have to carry an extra case just for them. You won't take professional grade photo's with it - but you'll get good pictures every shot.
customer_reviews.author: nitrofd

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera if you want one to carry around and snaps pretty fast. shots your might not of gotten with a bigger camera because of it being so handy to carry...clear shots, color is good, easy to cary around in purse around neck ( I got longer strap off old camera) or will fit in most pockets love the zoom but have to be careful when zoomed way out to hold it still. Would not recommend much longer zoom on a point and shoot, it just gets to shaky unless on tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it for my daughter who is going abroad for a year. it replaces a similar Canon bought in 2009. This is a good little camera, worth the extra cost. The color was chosen because it is very easy to set the camera down and forget it. The red color is more visible.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago for my African safari trip and was able to take great pictures with it! It is compact enough to not weigh you down while you're traveling yet has all the features you need to take great photos! This one's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Onelove

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, with great results
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. I had a Canon before (it was stolen) so I already knew pretty much how it worked. Takes lovely pics, even with my slight tremor. I haven't used the wifi function yet - I find it easy just to transfer what's on the data card to my computer. Great camera for novices like me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. Sharp picture
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Sharp picture, easy to use. I have another just like it that got dropped in water so this is a replacement. I have traveled with it for years. Love what this little camera can do.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN W.

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful small camera. I love the creative photo feature, and think the camera is a great replacement for my very heavy DSLR that I have been lugging around the world for 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pictures and video!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes awesome pictured and video! It's very easy to use, especially since I have other Canon camera's, and controls and menus are similar. I especially like the 18x zoom. This camera replaced a previous Canon camera that I took swimming in the ocean, which it didn't like! My bad! I suggested to my wife that she sew the pockets to my swimsuits closed, since I also "dunked" a cell phone previously!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ryan

customer_reviews.title: am very happy with camera
customer_reviews.text: So far, am very happy with camera. Was one of the easiest I have ever had to set up. The one thing I do not like is that it shuts off after 3 seconds if not used. It takes me much longer than that to set up some pix! Will have to play with it more to see if there is a reset. It is lightweight, easy to tuck into a purse. I think I will be giving it a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Stedford

customer_reviews.title: She reports that it links to her wifi easily and does everything she needed/wanted it to do
customer_reviews.text: bought as a Christmas gift for my 19 year old step daughter. She reports that it links to her wifi easily and does everything she needed/wanted it to do. Very pleased with it. Small enough to keep in her purse so there when she wants it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera. The zoom is wonderful as are many of its other features. Was looking for a small but fairly sophisticated camera to fit in a pocket, and this nailed it
customer_reviews.author: Marsh Hen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I am a professional photographer but needed something small for our family outings. This is perfect. Good quality and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: great little camera. there is a lot more here than meats the eye for a point and shoot. easy to use, esp one handed-takes great shots every time. I love the fast shutter speed setting for action shots. you can freeze fast moving objects into great photos. has a great zoom to get things up close-it is light weight and the red color is easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: abcorders

customer_reviews.title: pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: It's not the easiest to figure out or maneuver the controls/displays. Good price point and handy size.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Performed better than high-end cameras
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera before I went on vacation to Wyoming and Montana. A couple of the friends I went with had very expensive digital SLR cameras with multiple lenses. I was very surprised when we went through our pictures and found that my zoom was far superior to their expensive SLRs. They were shocked that I got much higher quality on the zoomed in wildlife pics. This camera is easy to use and I am not a camera expert. The only problem I had was being able to see the LCD view screen in strong sunlight, but I'm assuming that is a problem with all cameras of this type.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera! The zoom is outstanding and you still get a clear picture when zoomed way in. I read about the wifi being a problem for some people, but it wasn't a main reason for buying it. I do have some trouble getting it to work every time, but eventually, it connects and that is a great feature. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: hanson5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: takes great close-ups of just a few inches and the 18x zoom pics are very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but no wrist strap!
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is great, takes fantastic pictures. However, I did not receive everything that I should have. There was no user manual or wrist strap, as indicated in the product description. There was a Canon battery and charger, so at least that part is good.
customer_reviews.author: hiker31

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take great pictures but does take adequate ones
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take great pictures but does take adequate ones. Not thrilled with all the Canon software in the download either. I don't think I'd buy this one again & will probably upgrade to something better fairly soon. It is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Serviceable Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera performs well, although it doesn't always want to focus on what is most crucial. The Wi-Fi hookup works well once you get it set up, but the instruction manual for the camera is really abysmal. The Amazon listing was clear about what was included, but somehow I expected it to come with a memory card, and had to buy that separately. The entry of passwords and the menus are a bit primitive. On the whole, a good buy for getting better than average snapshots.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: At first really loved the camera but after a 3-4 uses the lens ...
customer_reviews.text: At first really loved the camera but after a 3-4 uses the lens protecter jammed and wouldn't close when camera turned off and sadly this happened the day after the return window ended.
customer_reviews.author: Brienne Burt

customer_reviews.title: connects to iphone great!
customer_reviews.text: connect the app it says and pictures can download to your iphone sooo easily. If your not techy at all like me call their customer service. camera is great !!
customer_reviews.author: Pizzza Bella

customer_reviews.title: Get the 610
customer_reviews.text: Needed a vlogging camera. This camera's video capabilities are OK. It sucks indoors, a lot of grain and is remotely good outside in a lot of light. Should've got the 610.
customer_reviews.author: Kwam

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for candid shots
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for candid shots. Most pictures, with the flash, are crisp and clear even if the kids move. I love the WIFI feature, sometime I need a photo and do not want to connect the camera to a computer to send it. Fast, responsive, and easy to use. I love the red color.
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Expert quality with point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. If you have an eye for photography and can catch scenery, it will perform better than expected. Excellent supervivid. Not the best zoom. You also don’t need to be an expert.
customer_reviews.author: Happily Divorced

customer_reviews.title: this is a GREAT camera and the quality of the pictures is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the hang of it, this is a GREAT camera and the quality of the pictures is amazing!!! I'm really happy with it and feel I won't ever be in need of another digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Point and Shoot capabilities are excellent. Use of the Wifi camera to internet features ...
customer_reviews.text: Point and Shoot capabilities are excellent. Use of the Wifi camera to internet features are very difficult to understand. I'm still learning. Old geezers like me find connecting to the cyber world a mystery, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Elpers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pictures. I don't love that the flash is manual and there is a bit of a delay when you try to press the button to take a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this camera. Small and compact but takes amazing photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great camera to use for small children
customer_reviews.text: Returned the camera - blurry pictures if the subject isn't standing perfectly still
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Great point and shoot. If you are trying to keep it simple but don't want to sacrifice quality. This is the one
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am taking this camera on a trip so I wanted it to be light, compact and easy to use. It is all three. Even though this was a used camera it was in pristine condition. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Folejan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous pocket sized camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my boyfriends five year old camera. It is amazing and has fabulous features. It is kind of silly that the case that it came with however, doesn't fit!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Buck

customer_reviews.title: Just took a trip to Costa Rica & took amazing pictures. Easy to use & carry
customer_reviews.text: Just took a trip to Costa Rica & took amazing pictures. Easy to use & carry... Took it on a zip-line!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I'm not overly impressed. It's an OK camera, but doesn't come with a memory card or a cable for connecting to ones computer. Also the wifi function is mystifyingly difficult to operate. However, the pictures are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wifi & App
customer_reviews.text: Good pictures, love the wifi feature and app to allow communication between it and tab without wires.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this camera for myself and I love it. Wasn't looking for anything too dramatic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for myself and I love it. Wasn't looking for anything too dramatic; just to take family pics. It does a great job. I do have a tendency to shake a little, but the pictures come out perfect. Great camera, great price. I have also used the self timer and it's easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaBert

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, just wish the wifi was easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: it does do a very nice job. Still prefer the larger cameras for most ...
customer_reviews.text: I also have a Canon 50D and 6D but, for occations were the larger cameras would not fit in, it does do a very nice job. Still prefer the larger cameras for most pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene F. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: excelent camera, size and weight are perfect
customer_reviews.text: excelent camera, size and weight are perfect, the duration of the battery is amazing, in good conditions of light is very quick in continuos mode, i totally recomend this camera
customer_reviews.author: caupolican carquez soler

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket sized camera shipped with dispatch by seller
customer_reviews.text: Top-rated Best Buy camera by Consumer Reports. Easy to use with great optical zoom. Got it just two days after I ordered it, although I didn't pay for express shipping.
customer_reviews.author: philoctetes

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera for me-Canon SX600 HS
customer_reviews.text: Easy point and shoot, quality product. Gone are the days when I photographed with all Nikon film equipment. Easy to slip in your pocket and with a 32 gig memory stick you can take a years worth of pics.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott Dean

customer_reviews.title: I miss the touch screen on my previous camera. ...
customer_reviews.text: I miss the touch screen on my previous camera. The wifi features are very clunky and cumbersome to use. Menu layout is not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I loved my old Canon
customer_reviews.text: I loved my old Canon, but I dropped it and searched all over for a new one. The prices were so high and I couldn't find exactly what I was looking for. Then I found it on Amazon! I am so very happy with it...it's just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pic's!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to get close-up shots on projects at work. The camera is working out very nicely for me, it's compact, easy to operate and it takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: M A S

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera - Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little camera that takes great pics. I am happy with the viewfinder, and, although it takes a little effort to learn what the camera can do, it's worth it. I'm buying one for my daughter who is off at college.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific point and shoot!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific point and shoot camera. I especially like the way the flash mechanism works. The zoom is better than I expected and the camera is very easy to use. I would highly recommend this camera. I love the red color.
customer_reviews.author: Tamira

customer_reviews.title: Out of focus!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe its a lemon but almost all my pictures turned out blurry. Im have had other canon cameras, even lower quality ones, that look much better!
customer_reviews.author: E Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Takes amazing pics that are much better than ones taken with a smartphone. Wireless works ok, and the built-in picture editing works well. Thanks to this camera, I have some very precious pictures of my baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting many compliments on the pictures I've taken with ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting many compliments on the pictures I've taken with this camera, to the point where some people think I'm a talented photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but the camera hesitates in auto mode so it's difficult to get the picture you want. The zoom is awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: shopper101

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: worked wonderful...was able to capture Grandson's football games just like I wanted and also was able to get some great pictures of Boston fall leaves...an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amcgee

customer_reviews.title: Canon makes a great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Canon cameras are noted for taking excellent picture. I love this camera but I had to load the 160 page User Guide to understand how to use some of its operations.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Blanch

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this camera. It is very easy to use, the zoom is amazing, and it takes good pictures. The only negative I have found so far is that the operation speed is a bit slow in flash mode.
customer_reviews.author: RandJ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. Something east to operate but ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Something east to operate but with some bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamwalkertx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use. very clear photos. i am delighted
customer_reviews.author: brendan benson

customer_reviews.title: came in excellent condition at the right price
customer_reviews.text: my wife has been wanting a new camera and this SX600 fulfills her every needs. came in excellent condition at the right price. Hooray for AMAZOM.com!!
customer_reviews.author: milton bernard

customer_reviews.title: We love the picture
customer_reviews.text: We love the picture. The only thing which is different from what I read from the reviews was that the flash needs be manually instead of manually activated.
customer_reviews.author: Read & tweet

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new little camera! Still am learning new things all the time. Great zoom! Bought it to do paintings so I needed a good zoom. Pictures are great and I love the Wi-Fi. Also fits in your pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the pictures at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter and family. Very happy with the pictures at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: pmc

customer_reviews.title: Love this little camera and the clarity and colors
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera and the clarity and colors! I have used a Nikon forever it seems, but it is a bit large and bulky for a lot of hiking. I am hooked on Canon now.
customer_reviews.author: Urewytch

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance. I wish the enclosed manual was more informative about all the features. Requires additional research. Very satisfied with the quality of construction.
customer_reviews.author: Pterodactyl

customer_reviews.title: Gift that turned out great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and my daughter loves the camera. Can't give much more details at this time except that she loves the size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: KristinaKay

customer_reviews.title: Super!!
customer_reviews.text: Super camera - very smart - easy to use and lots of flexability IF you take the time to read the manual (lol) and practice.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I like this little camera. It has many great features and is very easy to use. I only had 2 days before my vacation to learn to use it. I managed to take lots of pictures and they all look great. I recommend this camera to anyone. Very glad my husband chose it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera, love the zoom, haven't had it long enough to use all the many features.
customer_reviews.author: girv

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, bit  complicated
customer_reviews.text: Pretty complicated for 'point and click,' but I eventually figured most things out. Nice quality shots in a small portable camera that fits neatly in a small purse or large pocket.
customer_reviews.author: d3

customer_reviews.title: The dials on the right side are confusing.
customer_reviews.text: The dials on the right side are confusing. It reverts to 'movie' mode from still picture mode on it's own
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: it's just perfect. Action shots can be a little blurry
customer_reviews.text: For what I use the camera for, it's just perfect. Action shots can be a little blurry, seems like the focus is somewhat slow, or I am too impatient to wait for it to focus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... camera's auto flash broke and thought it would be nice to have a camera where you pop the flash ...
customer_reviews.text: My last camera's auto flash broke and thought it would be nice to have a camera where you pop the flash up yourself. Just a pain when you are trying to get a picture right away.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great small camera for those times when the smartphone is not good enough
customer_reviews.author: Ursa major

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clarity of photos
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clarity of photos. Easy to use. Have to manually raise flash. SX 200 flash popped up automatically which was nice. Overall good camera.
customer_reviews.author: John H Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Im biased, but I've bought several PowerShots over the last decade. I love them...much better pics than with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: TODMTNS

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use camera
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use camera. Slim profile fits easy in my pocket. Took clear crisp photos even on full optical zoom. Great quality for a point and shoot!
customer_reviews.author: Mavis J

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: camera works great and easy to use and it takes awesome pictures or video.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I Pinkham

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pictures going to put to the test on my upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: Randy P

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Love the size. It was for my wife and she just loves it. Pictures are good, camera easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fuller

customer_reviews.title: This little camera does everything I need and is easy to handle and use
customer_reviews.text: Got it to replace a Kodak camera that they don't have software for anymore. I had used Canon Sure shots when you used actual film.This little camera does everything I need and is easy to handle and use.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Cooley - Newly Widowed

customer_reviews.title: I love. it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great little camera that has a nice zoom and is easy to carry in my pocket. I have a bigger camera but not easy to carry but this one is.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Lipchik

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SX600 HS 16MP Digital Camera (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:BaseThe Power Shot SX600 HS camera takes you up on the stage, down on the field or anywhere a great shot is happening! That"s because tucked into its super-slim 1.02-inch profile is an astonishing feat of engineering: a high-powered 18x Optical Zoom. With a zoom this big in a camera this small, you"ll be ready to capture all the moments that matter, whenever and wherever they happen. And built-in Wi-Fi -lets you share the fun with friends and family right away - transfer images and video directly to select social networking sites, mobile devices and your computer.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

POWERFUL ZOOM TO GO
The PowerShot SX600 HS camera takes you up on the stage, down on the field or anywhere a great shot is happening! That's because tucked into its super-slim 1.02-inch profile is an astonishing feat of engineering: a high-powered 18x Optical Zoom. With a zoom this big in a camera this small, you'll be ready to capture all the moments that matter, whenever and wherever they happen. And built-in Wi-Fi® lets you share the fun with friends and family right away – transfer images and video directly to select social networking sites, mobile devices* and your computer. You can even use the camera for remote capture with your smartphone or tablet**, and simply touch to a compatible Android™ device*** using built-in NFC (Near Field Communication) for easy wireless connectivity. You'll also capture stunningly realistic 1080p Full HD video, and use Hybrid Auto to automatically create an exciting highlight reel of an entire day's fun from quick video clips taken before each still. Ideal for the busy photographer looking to travel light, the PowerShot SX600 HS is the camera to slip into your pocket.

* Compatible with iOS versions 6.0/6.1/7.0, Android smartphone versions 2.3.3/4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3 and Android tablet versions 4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3. Data charges may apply.
** With the download of the free Canon CameraWindow app. This software enables you to upload images to social network services. Before uploading images, please be aware that image files may contain privacy-related information such as people and places. If necessary, please delete such information. Canon does not obtain, collect or use such images or any information included in such images through this software. 
*** Compatible with Android devices version 4.0 or later.

SUPERB ZOOM FOR SPECTACULAR RANGE
18X OPTICAL ZOOM
The powerful 18x Optical Zoom range (35mm equivalent: 25–450mm) on the PowerShot SX600 HS is ideal for capturing memories of kids' achievements on the sporting field, recitals, plays and concerts – all those times when your access to the action is limited. From landscapes and wildlife to city scenes and more, this camera has you covered – all while fitting in your pocket. Zooming action is quick and precise, and genuine Canon optics help ensure brilliant clarity. Chromatic aberration is compensated across the entire range, and the lens's high optical resolving power works with the camera's high-resolution sensor and advanced image stabilization systems to produce clear, sharp, beautifully detailed images at any zoom length.

SHARE IMAGES AND VIDEO WHEREVER AND WHENEVER
BUILT-IN WI-FI® MAKES SHARING QUICK AND EASY
The PowerShot SX600 HS camera is equipped with built-in Wi-Fi® technology for on-the-go convenience when you want to share your photos and videos with friends, family and the whole world. The camera can connect directly to both iOS® and Android™ devices*, and upload images via the free Canon CameraWindow app** without a computer. Easily post your images to social networking and media sites – Facebook®, Twitter®, YouTube™, Flickr® and now Google Drive™ – through CANON iMAGE GATEWAY# or save them to the online photo album to share anytime, anywhere. You can control the destination of your uploads to share with everyone or to selected groups, and even add comments. Sharing video is also easy with the PowerShot SX600 HS, which records video using the easy-to-share MP4 format. Enhanced Wi-Fi® makes posting in real time possible, so you can keep everyone up to date with photos and video even as events unfold. The built-in Wi-Fi® technology on the PowerShot SX600 HS also allows you to transfer images to other Wi-Fi® equipped PowerShot cameras or print your photos directly to a PictBridge (Wireless LAN) certified printer.

One-touch connection to your mobile device or computer is made possible on the PowerShot SX600 HS with the camera's dedicated Mobile Device Connect Button. You can choose to transfer images to your smartphone or tablet for immediate sharing with the CameraWindow app**, or to your computer on the same network with Image Sync to make saving and organizing your images easier. When the camera finds a linked computer on the same wireless network, images are sent directly to it. Otherwise, images are temporarily stored on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY# then transferred once a connection is made, eliminating the need for cables.

REMOTE SHOOTING
With the built-in Wi-Fi® on the PowerShot SX600 HS, you can use your smartphone or tablet* to remotely control the camera. Simply connect wirelessly to your device and access the free Canon CameraWindow app**. Your device will show a live image of the camera's capture – perfect for a commemorative group photo, wildlife shots and all kinds of situations. The camera's versatile 18x Optical Zoom, flash, self-timer and shutter are all under your control, with images being saved to your camera as usual.

* Compatible with iOS versions 6.0/6.1/7.0, Android smartphone versions 2.3.3/4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3 and Android tablet versions 4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3. Data charges may apply.
** This software enables you to upload images to social network services. Before uploading images, please be aware that image files may contain privacy related information such as people and places. If necessary, please delete such information. Canon does not obtain, collect or use such images or any information included in such images through this software.
# One-time registration is required on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY online photo album.

SIMPLY TAP TO CONNECT
BUILT-IN NFC (NEAR FIELD COMMUNICATION) FOR EASIER WI-FI® CONNECTIVITY
The PowerShot SX600 HS camera supports NFC (Near Field Communication) technology, eliminating the need to find and open the Canon CameraWindow app* on your mobile device. Simply touch the NFC icon on your camera to your compatible Android device**, and the CameraWindow app will launch automatically for quick, easy sharing of your images. Built-in NFC technology also makes it simpler to install the app. If the app hasn't been installed yet, once you touch the devices together for the first time, the download screen will display automatically.

* This software enables you to upload images to social network services. Before uploading images, please be aware that image files may contain privacy related information such as people and places. If necessary, please delete such information. Canon does not obtain, collect or use such images or any information included in such images through this software.
** Compatible with Android devices version 4.0 or later.

RETHINK PHOTOGRAPHY WITH CREATIVE SHOT
CREATIVE SHOT MODE
In addition to the versatile power of its amazing 18x Optical Zoom, the PowerShot SX600 HS also turns out impressive artistic photos with Creative Shot mode. Rather than randomly applying filters, Creative Shot mode takes advantage of advanced Canon technologies to analyze the individual scene, subject and exposure to apply any of 46 filter options. In addition to the original shot, the camera automatically produces and saves five additional variations of the composition. Filter choices are grouped into Retro, Monochrome, Special and Natural categories to make exploring the world of artistic photography fun and easy, or simply select Auto to access the full range of effects. With Creative Shot mode, the result is stunning artistic photos that are perfect for sharing.

BEAUTIFUL IMAGES AND INCREDIBLE PERFORMANCE START HERE
16.0 MEGAPIXEL HIGH-SENSITIVITY CMOS SENSOR
The PowerShot SX600 HS camera's 16.0 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor is the highest resolution CMOS sensor used in any PowerShot camera. The difference this makes in your everyday photography is remarkable. The large sensor takes in more light, so images are clear and beautifully detailed. High ISO shots are particularly impressive, with less noise and expanded dynamic range. And the 16.0 Megapixel resolution gives you the flexibility to be more creative with your shots: crop and enlarge any part of an image – you can be confident that the detail and resolution you need are there.

DIGIC 4+ IMAGE PROCESSOR
The new Canon DIGIC 4+ Image Processor powers the PowerShot SX600 HS camera's advanced functions and capabilities, including Hybrid Auto, Creative Shot, and Full HD video shooting at 30p in the easy-to-share MP4 format. Its accelerated processing speed creates fast, responsive performance, for a shooting experience that's easy and natural. The DIGIC 4+ Image Processor also enhances image quality in several ways. Processing of high ISO shots has been shortened by 60% compared to the DIGIC 4 Image Processor. This significantly reduces noise for brilliant color, smooth gradations, and beautiful detail even in low light. The processor also allows for the integration of electronic Dynamic IS. This advanced system compensates for multiple motion types, effectively preventing angular blur, shift blur, and blur caused by parallel movement and tilt shift. The result is images that are reliably sharp and clear at all lengths of the camera's powerful zoom. The processor's highly efficient design also extends battery life.

CANON HS SYSTEM HELPS PROVIDE EXCELLENT LOW-LIGHT PERFORMANCE
The slim, compact PowerShot SX600 HS gives you the power to capture beautifully detailed, naturally lit images even in low light – reducing the need for flash and the occasionally unwelcome effects it produces. That's because the camera's 16.0 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor works with the camera's new DIGIC 4+ Image Processor to create the Canon HS SYSTEM, specifically engineered for spectacular low-light performance. With the Canon HS SYSTEM, you'll experience excellent tracking performance even in low light, and achieve gorgeous still image quality at ISO speeds up to ISO 3200; beautiful low-light shots are possible with minimal noise and maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas.

GET THE COMPLETE HD EXPERIENCE
CAPTURE STUNNING 1080P FULL HD VIDEO WITH A DEDICATED MOVIE BUTTON
The PowerShot SX600 HS not only preserves your special video memories with spectacular realism, but does it in a format that makes them easy to share. You can simply press the dedicated movie button to start and stop video recording, so you're always ready to capture the moment as it happens. The camera records in stunningly realistic 1080p Full HD, so even when played back on a big-screen HDTV, your videos are crystal clear, with smooth action and beautifully natural color. Thanks to the advanced DIGIC 4+ Image Processor, video can be captured at 30 frames per second in MP4 format. MP4 videos are perfectly sized for quick online sharing – whether you're showing relatives what the kids are up to or posting status updates on social networking sites.

SHARE WITH A SINGLE TOUCH
MOBILE DEVICE CONNECT BUTTON
It's now easier than ever to connect your PowerShot SX600 HS camera to an iOS® or Android™ device* using the Mobile Device Connect Button. The button allows you to choose to transfer images to your smartphone or tablet for immediate sharing with the CameraWindow app**, or to your computer on the same network with Image Sync to make saving and organizing your images easier. Once your device is registered on the camera, simply press the Mobile Device Connect button for easy connection.

By connecting to a smartphone with the CameraWindow app using the Mobile Device Connect Button, you can browse and share images while still leaving the camera inside a bag. It is also possible to turn off the PowerShot SX600 HS quickly and easily, directly from a smartphone. Once your camera is linked to your computer on the same wireless network, you can automatically transfer images to it, for easy saving and organizing of your photos. The Mobile Device Connect Button is great for quick and easy sharing from a fun day out with friends and family.

* Compatible with iOS versions 6.0/6.1/7.0, Android smartphone versions 2.3.3/4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3 and Android tablet versions 4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3. Data charges may apply.
** This software enables you to upload images to social network services. Before uploading images, please be aware that image files may contain privacy related information such as people and places. If necessary, please delete such information. Canon does not obtain, collect or use such images or any information included in such images through this software.

REMEMBER THE DAY IN CRISP HD
HYBRID AUTO
The PowerShot SX600 HS camera features Hybrid Auto, which records up to four seconds of video every time you shoot a still image, then automatically joins the clips and pictures* into a video that captures the essence of special days: vacations, important occasions, or any time you're shooting many shots in a day. With Hybrid Auto, this “highlight reel” is stunningly beautiful. Hybrid Auto automatically recognizes the scene and optimizes camera settings to capture the highest possible image quality. The resulting 720p HD video is properly exposed, crisp and steady.

* Pictures can be withheld from the resulting video via menu settings.

A SMARTER CAMERA MEANS BETTER PHOTOS AND VIDEOS
SMART AUTO
Sophisticated Canon technology that makes getting that great shot as simple as pressing the shutter button, Smart AUTO automatically detects scenes by assessing various factors in both the background and the subject. On the PowerShot SX600 HS, detected scenes are analyzed using 32 predefined shooting situations. The camera then makes optimal settings to ensure the best possible image capture, whether you're shooting stills or video. Smart AUTO also includes Advanced Subject Detection, which allows the camera to detect and track non-human moving subjects like animals and vehicles. With Smart AUTO, all you have to do is frame your shot and capture away.

SHOOTING MODES/SPECIAL SCENE MODES
Smart AUTO The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity. Movie Digest & Hybrid Auto Automatically selects shooting settings for optimal quality and records a video clip every time you capture a still image. One day's worth of clips are then combined into a single video. Program The camera automatically and intelligently selects the aperture/shutter speed combination based on the shooting conditions. Creative Shot Analyzes the scene and applies a number of creative filters to automatically create five variations in addition to the original image. Portrait Brings the subject into focus while beautifully blurring the background. Smart Shutter The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame. High-Speed Burst Captures rapid action frame by frame, by shooting continuously at a high speed while the shutter button is held down. Handheld Night Scene Take clear and steady pictures at night without the use of a tripod. Low Light For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly lit situations. Fisheye Effect Now you can get the fisheye effect – a classic photographic distortion – without a fisheye lens. Miniature Effect Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image. Toy Camera Effect Simulates photos taken with “toy” or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect. Monochrome Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue. Super Vivid Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors. Poster Effect Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts. Snow Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint. Fireworks Create brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks. Long Shutter Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography. Movie Record video in stereo sound. Unwanted scenes can be deleted in playback mode. Actual results may vary from examples shown above.
Final image may vary depending on picture composition.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
INTELLIGENT IS
It's easy to capture clear, steady images with the PowerShot SX600 HS, even in low light without using a tripod. That's because the camera is equipped with Canon's innovative Intelligent IS. The system automatically analyzes camera movement and applies the best shake correction method for the shooting situation – allowing you to focus on framing and capturing your shot. For stills, the system selects from Normal IS, Panning IS, Macro (Hybrid) IS and Tripod modes. When shooting video, the system selects from Dynamic IS, Powered IS, Macro (Hybrid) IS and active Tripod IS modes. New icons clearly mark the image stabilization mode, whether youâ€™re shooting still images or video.

Still Image Shooting Normal IS Corrects for a wide range of camera movement when shooting stills. Panning IS Panning motion is detected so that IS does not interfere with desired camera movement. Macro (Hybrid) IS Corrects for shift-type camera shake, which typically occurs in macro (close-up) shooting. Tripod When tripod use is detected, the Image Stabilizer is stopped because it is not needed. Video Recording Dynamic Effective for video shooting at wide-angle focal lengths, eliminating the unwanted shaking that typically occurs while walking. Powered Compensates for hand movement when shooting video at the telephoto end of the zoom range, where camera shake is magnified. Macro (Hybrid) IS Corrects for motion blur that is likely to occur when shooting video while walking. Also compensates for the shift-type camera shake common in macro shooting. Active Tripod IS When shooting video while using a tripod, the image stabilization is active to compensate for slight camera shake. ECO MODE
The PowerShot SX600 HS features ECO Mode, which provides more shots per single charge through LCD monitor and camera power management. ECO Mode can be activated for easy power preservation when an outlet is unavailable or the moment is too exciting to put the camera down. The mode quickly wakes the camera from sleep when a button is pressed. With ECO Mode activated to conserve power, you can even stay connected for longer with the built-in Wi-Fi® featured on the camera. When the fun with family and friends runs late into the night, you can be assured your camera can keep up.

EASILY PRINT YOUR FAVORITE MOMENTS
It's quick and easy to make beautiful prints from your PowerShot camera. With the built-in Wi-Fi® on your PowerShot camera, it's easy to send your images to a PictBridge (Wireless LAN) compatible printer. Or use the Direct Print system; simply connect your PowerShot SX600 HS camera to a Canon PIXMA or SELPHY photo printer with a USB cable and press the button to print. Easily turn every favorite moment into an amazing photo.

AVAILABLE IN 31 LANGUAGES
There are now a total of 31 display languages from which you can choose: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Hebrew, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified/Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Greek, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Romanian, Ukrainian, Farsi, Hindi, Malay, Indonesian and Vietnamese.
feature_bullets: 16.0 Megapixel High Sensitivity CMOS sensor combined with the DIGIC 4+ Image Processor creates the Canon HS SYSTEM, which helps provide excellent lowlight performance.
18x Optical Zoom (25-450mm) helps ensure outstanding optical performance and versatility.
Creative Shot mode uses composition, color and lighting from your original image to create unique images with an artistic flair.
Capture stunning 1080p Full HD video with a dedicated movie button.
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations.
